website_summaries.verdict: Manufactured by a trusted company in the automobile industry – if you want results, this is the best octane booster on the market.
pros: Has an earned reputation for being one of the best octane boosters on the market, and works in almost any engine, including carbureted and fuel injected
Case of 12 bottles – each treats up to 25 gallons of gas
cons: Some users didn't notice results, and some didn't need a pack of 12 – otherwise it's hard to find complaints about this product

customer_reviews.title: Great fuel additive that allowed us to tune our car for 93 octane fuel
customer_reviews.text: In the west, we can only get 91 octane gas. I wanted my car tuned for 93 octane fuel, so I add a full bottle for each fill-up and after our tune, this has worked really well. Each bottle is good for 30 points, which means +3 on the octane of the base fuel. When we dynoed the vehicle people were amazed at the power and torque we were getting from the improved coils, spark plugs, headers, and the tune optimizing these changes, along with dialing the engine in for 93 octane fuel. This is cost and power effective!
customer_reviews.author: WileEC

customer_reviews.title: Brings 90 octane ethanol free gasoline up to 92 +
customer_reviews.text: This product solves a problem with collector cars driven relatively few miles and stored when roads are salted. It is not and doesn't replace "stabilizer" but is compatible with many, check with their Customer Service phone. Hagerty lists 2 web sites for ethanol free gasoline when you enter a zip code. Pure-Gas.com & BuyRaelGas.com. It seems Lucas is a bit conservative in their claim of octane boot, my BiTurbo seems to accelerate better with no pinging. I can open up the garage and back out enough to run 15 minutes each week until spring rains wash the salt off the roads.
customer_reviews.author: Patrick @ A2

customer_reviews.title: This booster I purchase by the case its the best octane booster on the market and costs less then ...
customer_reviews.text: Amazon asks me to review products I buy and use, if I think a product deserves one star that's what it gets. I have been into motor sports for a long time and have tried most products out there. I have found that Lucas is the only company that doesn't lie to promote sales, every single product they sell works as advertised. This booster I purchase by the case its the best octane booster on the market and costs less then most others. I recommend using it in early vehicles pre 1970 without a catalytic converter ..
customer_reviews.author: Bikers56flh

customer_reviews.title: work for me
customer_reviews.text: My van is recommended for premium gar even though regular gas work as well. To save money, we have used regular gas for the past 160000 miles. Long story short, I got to know Lucas octane booster and gave it a try recently, I am pleased with the results: feeling smooth, more powerful, and nimble. Engine is quieter even driving past 80 miles/hr. More importantly, it appears to improve gas mileage (5 to 9%). This really helps to offset the cost to purchase these octane booster.
customer_reviews.author: IH

customer_reviews.title: Turns Regular to Premium & Saves $$$$'s
customer_reviews.text: My car required Premium Fuel. Can generally add one bottle of this to the tank and fill up with Regular and car will still run greate. As Premium is $0.60 per gallon more expensive and the vehicle holds 20+ gallons, it saves a few $$$$ to use this product vs. filling up with Premium gas every time.
customer_reviews.author: T Hill

customer_reviews.title: Smooth performance
customer_reviews.text: My local custom car shop recommended this product. I bought the case and I am pretty happy with the snooze performance I’m getting in my 1969 cook her application. My local custom car shop recommended this product. I bought the case and I am pretty happy with the snooze performance I’m getting in my 1969 cover application. I can’t say the mileage is noticeably different for this muscle car application but the case value is certainly better than the individual bottle purchase. Got similar results for my 2014 F150 application .
customer_reviews.author: PAUL A. FORD

customer_reviews.title: Something that works...
customer_reviews.text: Seems like this product really works. I had bad pinging (pre-detonation) in high mileage Dodge truck. In hot weather under a load it sounded terrible. Premium gas solved the problem, but this product about half the price of the additional money to fill with premium. Probably deposits in the heads, but with 200,000 hesitant to spend the money to manually have heads cleaned.
customer_reviews.author: K. Schein

customer_reviews.title: Does what it says it will do!
customer_reviews.text: Everything went awesome. Super fast shipping and product works as advertised. No knocking and performance seems to be better when added to pump gas per directions. Highly recommend! Great option when higher octane fuels aren't available!
customer_reviews.author: Racer21

customer_reviews.title: Lucas has made another great product. It’s works significantly better than the 104+ ...
customer_reviews.text: Helps out 87 octane fuel tremendously. My 2016 Chevrolet Colorado 4 cylinder would spark knock (ping) very badly on 87 octane. After two tanks running this product the spark knock stopped. Lucas has made another great product. It’s works significantly better than the 104+ red bottle brand octane booster.
customer_reviews.author: kyle

customer_reviews.title: Saves quite a bit of money at the pump
customer_reviews.text: This works quite well. I have an Audi S5 with a 91 Octane APR tune. 91 costs $0.80 per gallon more than 87. With each 15-16 gallon fill-up, I'm saving $6-$7 by using this - yes, I factored in the cost of the product. Performance between the 91 and 87+this product is the same.
customer_reviews.author: S. Janowski

customer_reviews.title: The high altitude in Colorado and 91 octane sucks the life out of my Audi RS6 and because ...
customer_reviews.text: The high altitude in Colorado and 91 octane sucks the life out of my Audi RS6 and because it's tuned, performance takes even more of a hit. Using this product improves the torque and the car runs much better.
customer_reviews.author: USGezr

customer_reviews.title: Instant throttle response and more power.
customer_reviews.text: I purchased a case of this product in April 2017 I’ve used it in my 1974 Plymouth satellite 360 with modifications to the engine it runs well no paining is a great additive. Increases octane rating on the gas and give my vehicle instant response more power.
customer_reviews.author: Lozzie1

customer_reviews.title: This is Real
customer_reviews.text: This Octane booster works. I bought a boat with 100+ gallons of 4 year old gas in it. After getting it started I could hear the motors starting to ping at cruising speed so I idled home. I added the Lucas booster (about 6 bottles) to about 4 gallons of gas in a can so I could mix it. Dumped it in and waited 3-4 hours to let it mix then idled the boat for 15 minutes or so to clear the fuel lines and took it up to cruising speed. The pinging stoped plus the motors sounded way better. Would be great for a high compression motor.
customer_reviews.author: Disco

customer_reviews.title: Buying this stuff by the case.
customer_reviews.text: I was having misfires with my tuned AMG S63 (5.5 liter) since I can’t get true 93 octane gas in my area any longer. I suspected I may have some carbon buildup on my intake valves. Cleaning them seemed to help, but I still had the issue under certain circumstances. Adding a bottle of this to each tank of gas (22 gal) and I’ve never had a misfire since.
customer_reviews.author: 357_Sig_P239

customer_reviews.title: Great Stuff
customer_reviews.text: This is the only Octane booster that I have used that actually works. I add it during hot weather in my 2008 MINI Cooper S JCW running 18psi of boost and get no knocking. Also noticed an improvement in mpg's too.
customer_reviews.author: Big Jim Swade

customer_reviews.title: Well worth the $
customer_reviews.text: I use 1/3 bottle per 25 +/- gallons. MPG is improved 12-16% at a cost of 5-8%. The real benefit is noticably improved throttle response and towing power on grades. Off idle slight hesitation is eliminated. 2016 F-250 Supercrew 6.2 gas (8400#) towing 8500# Travel trailer. The results were the same on our '08 F-250 Supercab 5.4 gas (7500#), 240,000 miles towing a 6500# TT
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: The Best I've ever bought, great price
customer_reviews.text: I have a High Performance car with a reprogrammed computer chip and this is the product to gain the extra horsepower that is available that can't be got with premium pump gas...i use it in every tank full, it also keeps the combustion chamber and injectors clean, you can tell the difference!!!
customer_reviews.author: Gary M Pirkle

customer_reviews.title: Does exactly what it's supposed to do
customer_reviews.text: No long overly wordy review here. If you're looking to quiet your engine or give it that extra umph, this is the cheapest alternative. It cleans fuel, and the performance gain is noticeable immediately. I purchased a case, even gave my father a bottle for his silverado just to see if he could tell a difference. He also notice the performance gains. This product along with Marvel's Mystery Oil will make your vehicle perform at it's best.
customer_reviews.author: Aaron

customer_reviews.title: Great gas mileage
customer_reviews.text: I love this octane boost, my Porsche runs great. Now, I buy mid-grade petroleum add the octane boost first then fill, its easy! My gas mileage is up and no knocking. It’s a beautiful thing!
customer_reviews.author: JABARI ALLEN

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: I use this on my Harley CVO Road King with engine modifications and it works like it should as well as eliminating pinging. I use one ounce per gallon or as close as I can achieve that ratio. I will be purchasing another case next year.
customer_reviews.author: George R. Ancona

customer_reviews.title: Big block muscle car go juice
customer_reviews.text: Ya say ya can't find high octane gas for your muscle car bunkie? Well, put your money down and pour in some of this go juice to keep you rod from knocking.
customer_reviews.author: JR

customer_reviews.title: Eliminates ping on high compression engines
customer_reviews.text: I have an older Harley with high compression - it does not like ethanol! Try to find high test 100% gasoline - good luck. Add a two or three ounces of this to the tank as needed and it is totally different. The product came as promised; on time and in good shape.
customer_reviews.author: Green Fatboy

customer_reviews.title: Destroys plugs and injectors
customer_reviews.text: This is after 12 bottles (1 bottle per tankful), and 900 miles. These injectors were almost new. My car has zero issues other than it requires higher octane than the 91 Octane fuel. Proof is in the photo!
customer_reviews.author: Ms. B

customer_reviews.title: No idea if it works or not but I have ...
customer_reviews.text: No idea if it works or not but I have been running 91 octane gas on 93 tune in my Mustang GT and so far it has been a month of racing and street pulls and drag time without any pinging, I'm loving it
customer_reviews.author: Oleksandr Kovaleno

customer_reviews.title: Buy it, use it and keep your engine running right!
customer_reviews.text: I use it with every fill up and will continue to do so.
customer_reviews.author: Kevin C. Cloutier

customer_reviews.title: Made  25 year old cars run reliably, after failing for 6 month to diagnose any other issues.
customer_reviews.text: Probably the best octane boost available to the mass market.
customer_reviews.author: Chris Burton

customer_reviews.title: Lucas Oil Octane Booster
customer_reviews.text: Performance increased in my vehicle. Used on Supercharged Mustang and Hi Perf 69 firebird
customer_reviews.author: energizer

customer_reviews.title: Seems to work.
customer_reviews.text: Received the octane boosters and apparently they work. Car runs great.
customer_reviews.author: Gregg Carter

customer_reviews.title: Helps!
customer_reviews.text: Easy to use, seems to help with my aging turbo-tuned A4 and pinging.
customer_reviews.author: Bryan P.

customer_reviews.title: It does it's job just fine and amazon is the cheapest I can get it
customer_reviews.text: Gotta use this stuff in my tuned truck. It does it's job just fine and amazon is the cheapest I can get it. I can feel a difference without adding it to the tank so I've been adding it to every tank so far. I'll continue to get it as long as I need it.
customer_reviews.author: Esteban Chavez

customer_reviews.title: Caution
customer_reviews.text: It is effective but you should use only about 1/2 oz per gallon, otherwise it will clog your catalytic converter. It happened to me when I used it as advertised, “Empty entire contents...”
customer_reviews.author: Lee Cain

customer_reviews.title: Addicitive!!!
customer_reviews.text: Be careful with the product, it is addictive. I used to use Torco before, and I get better gas mileage and more smooth power band. Even though Lucas is not as good as Torco, but at the price point for the product I can use it every other tank or every tank if I need it to.
customer_reviews.author: grandpadriver

customer_reviews.title: Works as stated, when I am forced to use ...
customer_reviews.text: Works as stated, when I am forced to use low octane gas (85-87) in my 11:1 compression Audi, this keeps the pinging at bay.
customer_reviews.author: David

customer_reviews.title: Exactly as advertised
customer_reviews.text: Awesome product, very reasonably priced, & super fast delivery. What more could I want?
customer_reviews.author: TEW KEWL

customer_reviews.title: No difference at all
customer_reviews.text: 2006 BMW 750Li Waste of money. No any difference regarding acceleration or MPG.
customer_reviews.author: KK

customer_reviews.title: Lucas oil octane booster
customer_reviews.text: An excellent product which I use with every tank fill up. The car seems to have more pep and there is a mileage increase. You notice the difference when you forget to put it in. For further performance I combine the octane booster with Lucas fuel treatment (6 0z octane booster with 10 oz of fuel treatment) --my tank holds 14 gallons. The combination keeps the injectors clean. This is important because the injectors do clog up and mpg and performance declines. Take it to the dealer and you will pay hundred of dollars.
customer_reviews.author: Don F--Los Angeles

customer_reviews.title: Pretty darn good
customer_reviews.text: I have tried this in my Ranger 900 xp, and it really seams to help, with power, and the smoothness of the machine. I also tried it my Toyota 4 runner , and so far the results are pretty good. Have not had a chance to check the mileage as yet.
customer_reviews.author: Steve

customer_reviews.title: Definitely provides higher octane gas for my older vehicle!
customer_reviews.text: This product has stopped the engine rattle in my 29 year old Toyota pickup; it needed higher octane gas, and this did the trick!
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Made my C300 performed pass 150K as it was 50K miles!
customer_reviews.text: Added sufficient power to an aging engine to go beyond 100K into 200K
customer_reviews.author: peter le

customer_reviews.title: Octane boost that works!!
customer_reviews.text: Hands down the BEST octane boost I've used. I have been involved in drag racing for over 30yrs. Other than purple gas and nitro methane this is the best stuff you can use for street cars!

customer_reviews.title: Stuff is fantastic. I run it in my Carbon Cub
customer_reviews.text: Stuff is fantastic. I run it in my Carbon Cub.

customer_reviews.title: It seems to work, at least my 1960's cars ...
customer_reviews.text: It seems to work, at least my 1960's cars designed for higher octane than is available today don't ping anymore.
customer_reviews.author: Robert S.

customer_reviews.title: I used 7 oz to 5 gallons of 89 Octane ...
customer_reviews.text: I used 7 oz to 5 gallons of 89 Octane gas, and in my 2012 1100 turbo Arctic cat at 240 hp no red light comes on for detention !
customer_reviews.author: Joe P.

customer_reviews.title: Second box for my third turbo-ed car!
customer_reviews.text: Where I live max octane is 92. I'll swear by this stuff and will continue to use it. Power band is even and predictable. This treats up to 20 or 25 gallons so I can use half a bottle for my 10 gallon tank and get good results.
customer_reviews.author: marchloe

customer_reviews.title: save your stored gas! Use this stuff for the off-season!
customer_reviews.text: I use this in fuel canisters where I store fuel to help keep up the octane level during the off-season. Putting half a bottle in a five-gallon container makes plenty of sense.
customer_reviews.author: Joseph

customer_reviews.title: This is the best product ever
customer_reviews.text: Have 1992 300ZX...She loves the product. This is the best product ever!!!
customer_reviews.author: Andrea Laboy

customer_reviews.title: Excellent product for high performance turbo vehicles
customer_reviews.text: I use this my 2006 Saab 9-3 Aero V6 with a MapTuner Stage 1 Upgrade. Premium fuel and a bottle of Octane Booster and my engine purrs as it snaps my head back in the seat at 20, 40, 60...
customer_reviews.author: S. Riedel

customer_reviews.title: Great subtitute for my E85 blend...
customer_reviews.text: It's hard to find race gas where I live, and quarter mile tracks are all closing down. I use Lucas as an alternative between my 20% E85 mixture on a tuned '16 Audi RS7. I can definitely tell the difference and can run my higher octane program with it. This multi pack is a great buy.
customer_reviews.author: First Amendment

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Nicely Priced, Well Packed, & Quickly Shipped. Just what I was looking for.
customer_reviews.author: RockIt Records

customer_reviews.title: Need a Boost
customer_reviews.text: This stuff is the real deal. I use this in a tuned 02' WRX with lots of mods and over 300 WHP. You can feel the difference.
customer_reviews.author: JD

customer_reviews.title: Mustang Cobra
customer_reviews.text: I bought this to boost the octane for my Mustang Cobra and boy does it work good, the price is good and no knocks or pings.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Definitely increases the octane of the fuel noticeably. I use it for track days.
customer_reviews.author: Nice Pony

customer_reviews.title: It Works
customer_reviews.text: I use this in my 69 camaro with a 540 big block.US lucky people in CA get to pay top dollar for junk gas with ethanol .got tired of having to put 2 gallons of vp 109 in each tank for 9 bucks a gallon.this product works and was able to bump timing back up

customer_reviews.title: Good buy!
customer_reviews.text: Performed as needed and the price was far less than I would have paid buying off the shelf.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: the best true Octane Booster, and yes the best price I could find.

customer_reviews.text: I use it in my 2015 toyota tundra supercharged pro series truck.Seems to work great!!

customer_reviews.title: Great Product
customer_reviews.text: It does what it promises.My car is definatley showing the performance difference that this product says it is going to give..
customer_reviews.author: Johnny D

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Gives my RV extra boost to go over mountains without bogging down.
customer_reviews.author: feedbacksd

customer_reviews.title: Excellent cold weather boost!
customer_reviews.text: Makes a big difference in burst off the line, especially on these cold days we are getting here in March!
customer_reviews.author: Saintvouxdoux

customer_reviews.title: MAGIC IN A BOTTLE
customer_reviews.text: If you live in CA where 91 octane is questionable at best, one bottle of this per 16 gallons of gas makes the difference for my highly tuned vehicle--no more hesitation. no more early detonation detection bogging. very tight, and high revving power band--it's not like a full tank of 100 octane but I would guess it's closer to 92-93 octane. Makes the difference when dropping the hammer. If you know what I mean.
customer_reviews.author: joMamma

customer_reviews.title: Best Price and Lucas products are again and again the best in the industry
customer_reviews.text: Best you can buy and best price. Nothing but Lucas when it comes to real performance additives.
customer_reviews.author: Doug C

customer_reviews.title: Ferrari on Lucas Octane Booster
customer_reviews.text: This is good juice. I use it in my F12 and can feel the added power. Now I need new rear tires.
customer_reviews.author: LovedPet

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great product. Use it with the SCT race tune, and really woke the Mustang up. Strongly recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: D. Pollock

customer_reviews.title: Power in a bottle
customer_reviews.text: Lucas supplies quality products and their octane booster does not disappoint. A full 3 octane point gain with a full bottle. I need to burn 93-94 octane in my car and this is the affordable way to do it.
customer_reviews.author: Corry P.

customer_reviews.title: If 93 octane is not available, this is your BEST BET!
customer_reviews.text: I have a 2013 BMW M3, and the motor is optimized for 93 octane gas like most Euro sleds. But guess what, I'll probably never see 93 octane gas here in So. Cal, until then, this octane booster is my best bet. The difference is big enough that within a few miles of driving after a bottle is added, the ECU in my car adjusts its mapping and added power can be felt through out the rev range. Most auto parts stores want $9.99 a bottle where I live, save your some money and get this from Amazon!
customer_reviews.author: Leo Cheng

customer_reviews.title: Stuff really works
customer_reviews.text: I've tried many octane boosts for my high compression Harley Davidson, and none have worked except Lucas High Octane Boost. Quits the pinging on acceleration, high heat or climbing. Seems to run better also. A must buy!
customer_reviews.author: bonanza

customer_reviews.title: Get some
customer_reviews.text: Stroker responded well to this product, very happy with it. Used 3/4 bottle for 14 gallons.
customer_reviews.author: Hog man

customer_reviews.title: Worth the Cost
customer_reviews.text: This stuff is great. It makes all off my vehicles run so much better. From my 4 cyl. Saab to my Chev PU with a 454 C.I. Hog the performance is worth the extra cost.
customer_reviews.author: gordy

customer_reviews.title: Lucas Oil 10026-PK Octane Booster
customer_reviews.text: I used this product in my 1970 Dodge Challenger 440 six pack and i was very pleased with the results as with sunoco ultra i would get pinging and adding Lucas Octane Booster i was able to advance my engine timing to where it should be without pinging,i had tried other octane booster products before without success,Lucas is the best! i

customer_reviews.title: Increases octane and cleans the fuel system.
customer_reviews.text: Boosts octane for a hotter , cleaner burn. This is a good product and it works. Cleans the whole fuel system.

customer_reviews.title: fantastic product.
customer_reviews.text: I use this with every fill up in my 370Z. You can't get 93 octane gas anywhere in Oklahoma anymore so this makes up for it very well. My Z loves it. So does my Harley.
customer_reviews.author: KK Downing

customer_reviews.title: Car runs great with this octane booster
customer_reviews.text: I use it in my tuned Corvette. I can really tell in the summer in Phoenix when its 115 degrees out and there is almost no ping under load. Car runs great with this octane booster. Can tell less when its 50 degrees out.
customer_reviews.author: Marc

customer_reviews.title: awesome product great value
customer_reviews.text: use in my Harely Davidson motorcycles, product removes any pinging I had, has great value for the price. I use it all the time. Hope it works good for you to.

customer_reviews.title: Keep it going Strong.
customer_reviews.text: This is great for upping the octane in the ride. Going to the track or if the ride is just sputtering Lucas makes great products.
customer_reviews.author: M.B.

customer_reviews.title: THIS OCTANE BOOSTER IS THE BEST I'VE EVER USED!!
customer_reviews.text: At one time or another i've tried all the octane boosters on the market;however,none of them can match the improved throttle response and off idle acceleration of the lucas oil octane booster.At $6/bottle you can't beat it!

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: This worked to stop my pinging by adding it to 87 oct gas.

customer_reviews.title: GET MORE POWER !

customer_reviews.author: DAVID M.

customer_reviews.title: The best
customer_reviews.text: I have a 95 Toyota Camry, 3.0L V6 with just under 90,000 miles. I was not getting the type of response at the pedal as I would like running 86 octane fuel. Poor accel., sluggish uphill, etc. I bought this product and saw a massive differance on the first go. Went up to 89 octane; even better. Now I use 93 octane with the booster and I know it is overkill but I have never enjoyed merging on to highways and green lights as much as I do now. :)
customer_reviews.author: DonkeyRope

customer_reviews.title: Definitely a great booster
customer_reviews.text: After reading the reviews here, and having bought the STP brand (much more pricier) I threw an entire bottle in my car (17.2 gallon capacity) and filled it up with 91 RON (Highest available at the time). The improvement was right away. No, flames weren't spitting out the tail pipe, but I can tell you that I noticed a pickup in acceleration, smoother shifting, and improved fuel mileage. I haven't given it 5 stars yet because I just tried it...but I soon will be throwing it in my motorcycles, and let folks know how it goes. All in all - a very good quality thus far for price.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Rocks

customer_reviews.title: ... r you’ll literally see your gas disappear this thing sucks in this car total waste royal purple definitely works ...

customer_reviews.title: Works great in 2011 Camaro SS convertible
customer_reviews.text: This product makes the LS3 motor sing. I don't care what 93 octane I put in, it still nocks and pings. But not any more. Not only does it sound better , it rums smoother and kicks some mustang behind, and chargers too. So kick it up a notch and feel the wind in your face. Yep, I use it in my Harley too. Works great! No side effects either. Just a smoother excelleration and a better running machine under foot or hand control.!
customer_reviews.author: tml9170

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great value although box was a little wet from a leaking bottle during shipping.

customer_reviews.title: Lucas Oil 10026-PK12 Octane Booster - 15 oz.
customer_reviews.text: What can i say? My Harley has about 11:1 compression and this product works better than any other I have tried, and the case price beats the single bottle price at the local parts store by several dollars per bottle.
customer_reviews.author: Steve in Md

customer_reviews.title: Octane Booster that works!
customer_reviews.text: Did not let tuner know I had this in tank when I was getting my car dyno tuned. I received a phone call asking what gas I had in gas tank because they were able to put a lot more timing into my car without experiencing any detonation.
customer_reviews.author: Prochargedstang

customer_reviews.title: I definitely feel a difference
customer_reviews.text: I've used different boosters in the past, but I like this one the best! Rpms feel smoother, acceleration feels good. I havent had a chance to do a long road trip or anything to see if it helps w/ my mpg's. I'm too busy throttling down to feel the rush of the turbo! Way to go Lucas!
customer_reviews.author: V70ARR

customer_reviews.title: The engine really wants 94 or higher octane or gas without the HORRIBLE ethanol (congress wake up
customer_reviews.text: It works very well. I have a high performance engine in my street rod and used to get some pinging under heavy loads. The engine really wants 94 or higher octane or gas without the HORRIBLE ethanol (congress wake up!!!). The booster really works and I only have to add it to 2 out of 3 fill ups of 10-12 gallons. I am going to try 1/2 a bottle to every fill up next.
customer_reviews.author: Len

customer_reviews.title: it helps
customer_reviews.text: My 428 cobra engine manuel states that the least octane recomened is 99.8 octane....I use two bottles per tank full of 93 octane fuel...that accorrding to tests gives me a hair over 100 octane.......
customer_reviews.author: John Gutterman

customer_reviews.title: Aquatrax F-12X Turbo 2003
customer_reviews.text: This stuff is secret sauce for the motors you LOVE, so far I have used it in my jet skis as it is listed not "street legal" well I "accidentally" put some in my truck and WOWZA! So I put some in my Nissan Murano too and KABAAM... and drove it at the track before i went back on the roads yeah right.
customer_reviews.author: Kzziggy1

customer_reviews.title: satisfied
customer_reviews.text: it works perfectly especially in old car. you can feel the difference in the engine with carburetor instead of injector... it doesn't work with new car, probably because they don't need extra power
customer_reviews.author: Cooper

customer_reviews.title: thought no mmt, but
customer_reviews.text: thought no mmt, but it has it. any thing without mmt available? ,,,,b, b l blb lblb blb lblblbl, b
customer_reviews.author: henry

customer_reviews.title: Spend Money on Something Better
customer_reviews.text: Some are saying that this is the best thing after the sliced bread. I do not agree. After 12 bottles I did not see any difference at all. No change in MPG or performance. Tried it in city driving as well as highways. Test car: 2009 BMW 550i. Gas used 93 octanes. Location: Chicago
customer_reviews.author: I. M. Sternic

customer_reviews.title: It works
customer_reviews.text: You can feel the difference. Doesn't work in all cars-just high performance. Tried in a Porsche turbo and nothing. Blah, blah, blah.
customer_reviews.author: Marinel

customer_reviews.title: Cheaper and better than high octane gas
customer_reviews.text: I put a 1/2 bottle in the tank of my '73 Z/28 every time I fuel up. Works better, and costs less than using high octane gas.
customer_reviews.author: Vicious

product_meta.title: Lucas Oil 10026-PK12 Octane Booster - 15 oz (Pack of 12)
product_meta.description: Lucas Oil Octane Booster bottle has been tested and proven to deliver three times more boost than most other brands. It's safe for turbos, oxygen sensors, and more! Stops knocks and raises performance in high compression engines. Safe for any gasoline engine. Lucas Octane Booster is a genuine performance enhancer! One 15 oz. bottle treats up to 25 gallons of fuel. Not street legal.
feature_bullets: Promotes clean fuel burn for fewer emissions
Safe for turbos, oxygen sensors and catalytic converters
Suitable for use in fuel injected and carbureted engines
Provides more boost than most other brands
